body:
So if you haven't noticed I haven't been on t.s or in-game for a couple days and the reason for that is 3 days ago I got an Cray and the doctor found a small brain tumor.

Now if it wasn't for my doctor I wouldn't be here right now being able to make this post.

I know some of you may be like oh why do we care but the reason I'm posting this is because maybe some of you guys know people with brain tumors or lost close people that died from them, and I know how it feels to lose someone to a brain tumor.

I might be on Team Speak or Skype if you want to talk but if I'm not I'm probably asleep or back at the hospital so wish me luck.

-Dawson
body_tagged:
So if you haven't noticed I haven't been on t.s or in-game for a couple days and the reason for that is 3 days ago I got an Cray and the doctor found a small brain tumor.

Now if it wasn't for my doctor I wouldn't be here right now being able to make this post.

I know some of you may be like oh why do we care but the reason I'm posting this is because maybe some of you guys know people with brain tumors or lost close people that died from them, and I know how it feels to lose someone to a brain tumor.

I might be on Team Speak or Skype if you want to talk but if I'm not I'm probably asleep or back at the hospital so wish me luck.

-Dawson

replies.body:
Cancer isn't diagnosed in just two days. It takes years for cancer to develop and because cancer can spread you need to do mri, pet and ct scans, which take weeks up to months until the scan results arrive. It doesn't happen in just two days.

You don't have cancer, as easy as that.

replies.body:
No, he doesn't have cancer and has never had it, whether you believe it or not is not my problem. I don't "act" like I know what people are going through, I know how it feels to lose someone to cancer and I would sure as hell not seek attention on a forum or internet.

I'm sure I know what people on this server are like, I can categorize them. We have the honest normal people, the people who dedicate their life to learn how to jitterclick *cough* j ..... *cough* and the youngins.

replies.body:
I can't tell if you're retarded or not.

People diagnosed with brain tumors often feel this intense pain in their head which usually leads them to contact a hospital where they're examined and such. If the hospital they're attending to is good enough they should be able to giveaway the results in 5 hours or less even.

Not entirely sure but this is what my teacher (Who was diagnosed with a brain tumor) told me at school.
As simple as that, she got her results in less than 1 day d:^)

replies.body:
I'm really sorry to hear about your condition, Dawson.
My prayers go out to you and your family, and I hope you continue on living strong and determined.
I don't know if this is a lie or not, and I sincerely don't know what to hope. Anyhow, the only one who knows if your health status is legitimate or not is you, so it all rests in your head.

Given this topic is creating a lot of controversy and unsolicited flaming, I'll go ahead and lock this thread.

Moreover, as cold or heartless as it may seem, the fact that it is a personal update contributes to the lock, as discussions in the forums are meant to be for everyone, not inclusive and/or attention seeking.

In behalf of the Staff Team, we wish you good luck. 

Locking.
